description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Disastr_Blastr is an experimental arcade shooter with an abstract minimalist visual style    Blaze your merciless path of devastation through a vast dimension of cortex-shattering cubic mayhem    Battle insidious enemies that combine abilities to create chaotically unpredictable emergent challenges    Seek and destroy brutal boss enemies to unlock wickedly challenging special stages
description.short: Disastr_Blastr is an experimental arcade shooter with an abstract minimalist visual style    Blaze your merciless path of devastation through a vast dimension of cortex-shattering cubic mayhem    Battle insidious enemies that combine abilities to create chaotically unpredictable emergent challenges    Seek and destroy brutal boss enemies to unlock wickedly challenging special stages
